price: Kinamsabihi kumtakasa Mwenyezi Mungu kila kiliomo ndani ya mbingu na ardhi. Na Yeye ndiye Mwenye nguvu, Mwenye hikima.
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: sabbaḥa lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
